title: Rover Saves Christmas
description: Roddy Doyle's fabulous sequel to the New York Times best seller THE GIGGLER TREATMENT . . . now in paperback!Rudolph the reindeer is being a pain. He only has to work one day a year and what does he do? He calls in sick! Enter Rover, the only dog with the smarts, talent, good looks, and charms to be a sub.Rover's about to take Santa on the ride of his life -- and readers get to come along.
author: Roddy Doyle
